next_steps.note: "Research and document 3 potential network scanning libraries/tools (e.g., Nmap, Scapy, Masscan) focusing on their API capabilities and suitability for automated use.",
"Define the scope of network scanning: specify target IP ranges/domains, desired scan types (e.g., ping sweep, port scan, OS detection), and acceptable scan intensity/rate.",
"Design a basic data structure to represent scanned network hosts and their discovered attributes (IP address, open ports, OS, etc.).",
"Implement a minimal 'ping sweep' functionality using a chosen library to verify basic network connectivity within the defined scope.",
"Create a simple error handling and logging mechanism to capture scan failures and unexpected behavior for debugging and monitoring."
